Description: User logs in to the application
User logs in to the application (v2)
Parameters: method (string): Login method v2 (email, google, apple)
method (string); referral_code (string?): Optional referral code used during signup
currency (string); price (double); product_id (string); quantity (int): Number of items purchased
duration_ms (int?): Time spent on previous screen in milliseconds; previous_screen (string?): Name of the previous screen; screen_name (string)
